links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a=4; t=Array[Prime,123]; Drop[t,a]-Drop[t,-a] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Aug 13 2009 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [NthPrime(n+4)-NthPrime(n): n in [1..100] ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 23 2011(Haskell)a031166 n = a031166_list !! (n-1)a031166_list = zipWith (-) (drop 4 a000040_list) a000040_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 23 2015
author: _Jeff Burch_
extensions: Offset changed from 2 to 1, and a(1)=9 added, by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 23 2011
